languages.text: "Кто? А, ксенос-то! Забился вот сюда", — {n}мужчина кивает на забаррикадированный шлюз.{/n} "Загнал туда нескольких людей, словно {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксов{/g} в забойник — только вопли оттуда и слышали... ну, парней уже не спасти было — так мы его там и заперли, чтобы не дать назад вылезти. Только вот если он там найдет какую-то щель, куда протиснуться сможет..."

traits.locale_text: "Кто? А, ксенос-то! Забился вот сюда", — {n}мужчина кивает на забаррикадированный шлюз.{/n} "Загнал туда нескольких людей, словно гроксов в зайбойник — только вопли оттуда и слышали... ну, парней уже не спасти было — так мы его там и заперли, чтобы не дать назад вылезти. Только вот если он там найдет какую-то щель или лазейку..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."
languages.original_text: "Кто? А, ксенос-то! Забился вот сюда", — {n}мужчина кивает на забаррикадированный шлюз.{/n} "Загнал туда нескольких людей, словно {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксов{/g} в забойник — только вопли оттуда и слышали... ну, парней уже не спасти было — так мы его там и заперли, чтобы не дать назад вылезти. Только вот если он там найдет какую-то щель, куда протиснуться сможет..."

traits.locale_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a butchery, all we could hear is screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he doesn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

traits.locale_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: « Qui ça ? Oh, le xénos ! Il est enfermé là-dedans. » {n}Il désigne la porte barricadée d'un signe de tête.{/n} « Il a rabattu des membres de l'équipage à l'intérieur, comme des {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} qu'on mène à l'abattoir. Pendant de longues minutes, on n'a plus entendu que des hurlements... Comme nous ne pouvions plus rien faire pour eux, nous avons verrouillé le sas pour l'empêcher de sortir. À moins qu'il ne parvienne à se glisser par un interstice... »
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."

traits.locale_text: « Qui ça ? Oh, le xénos ! Il est enfermé là-dedans. » {n}Il désigne la porte barricadée d'un signe de tête.{/n} « Il a rabattu des membres de l'équipage à l'intérieur, comme des {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} qu'on mène à l'abattoir. Pendant de longues minutes, on n'a plus entendu que des hurlements... Comme nous ne pouvions plus rien faire pour eux, nous avons verrouillé le sas pour l'empêcher de sortir. À moins qu'il ne parvienne à se glisser par un interstice... »
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: 「誰かと？ああ、異種族です！あそこに閉じ込められています」{n}バリケードで塞がれた門の方に頷く。{/n}「ヤツは屠殺場の{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}のように、何人ものクルーをあそこに集めたのです。聞こえるのは悲鳴ばかり…彼らを救うことができなかったため、ヤツが這い上がってこられないよう、閉じ込めってやったんです。隙間を見つけて通り抜けなければの話ですが…」
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かと？ああ、異種族です！あそこに閉じ込められています」{n}バリケードで塞がれた門の方に頷く。{/n}「ヤツは屠殺場の{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}のように、何人ものクルーをあそこに集めたのです。聞こえるのは悲鳴ばかり…彼らを救うことができなかったため、ヤツが這い上がってこられないよう、閉じ込めってやったんです。隙間を見つけて通り抜けなければの話ですが…」
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: “您说谁？哦，那个异型啊！他就躲在里面。”{n}他朝被路障封死的大门点了点头。{/n}“他把一大群船员关进了那间屠宰场，就像屠宰{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}一样。我们只能听到尖叫声……根本救不了那些人。于是我们把他锁在了里面，这样他就出不来了，除非他能想办法找条缝钻出来……”
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."

traits.locale_text: “您说谁？哦，那个异型啊！他就躲在里面。”{n}他朝被路障封死的大门点了点头。{/n}“他把一大群船员关进了那间屠宰场，就像屠宰{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}一样。我们只能听到尖叫声……根本救不了那些人。于是我们把他锁在了里面，这样他就出不来了，除非他能想办法找条缝钻出来……”
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Wer? Ach, der Xenos! Er hat sich da drin verschanzt." {n}Er nickt in Richtung des verbarrikadierten Tors.{/n} "Er hat ein paar Crewmitglieder hineingetrieben wie {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groxe{/g} in ein Schlachthaus. Wir konnten nur ihre Schreie hören ... Tja, und da wir sie nicht retten konnten, haben wir ihn da drin eingesperrt, damit er nicht hinauskriechen kann. Wenn er nicht irgendwo einen Spalt findet, durch den er sich quetschen kann ..."
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."

traits.locale_text: "Wer? Ach, der Xenos! Er hat sich da drin verschanzt." {n}Er nickt in Richtung des verbarrikadierten Tors.{/n} "Er hat ein paar Crewmitglieder hineingetrieben wie {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Groxe{/g} in ein Schlachthaus. Wir konnten nur ihre Schreie hören ... Tja, und da wir sie nicht retten konnten, haben wir ihn da drin eingesperrt, damit er nicht hinauskriechen kann. Wenn er nicht irgendwo einen Spalt findet, durch den er sich quetschen kann ..."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: «¿Quién? ¡Ah, el xenos! Se ha atrincherado ahí dentro». {n}Señala con la cabeza a la puerta obstruida.{/n} «Acorraló a varios tripulantes en la estancia, como {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} guiados al matadero, y lo único que oímos fueron sus gritos... En fin, como ya no podíamos salvarlos, decidimos encerrarlo ahí dentro para evitar que se escabullera. A menos que encuentre alguna grieta por la que escurrirse...».
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién? ¡Ah, el xenos! Se ha atrincherado ahí dentro». {n}Señala con la cabeza a la puerta obstruida.{/n} «Acorraló a varios tripulantes en la estancia, como {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} guiados al matadero, y lo único que oímos fueron sus gritos... En fin, como ya no podíamos salvarlos, decidimos encerrarlo ahí dentro para evitar que se escabullera. A menos que encuentre alguna grieta por la que escurrirse...».
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow

languages.text: "Kim? Ha, zeno! Şurada kapalı hâlde." {n}Kapalı kapıyı işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bir sürü tayfayı, mezbahaya giden {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grokslar{/g} misali orada topladı. Sonrasında çığlıktan başka bir şey duymadık. Onları kurtaramadık, bari dışarı çıkmasın diye onu oraya kilitleyelim dedik. Bir delik bulup dışarı sızarsa bilemiyorum tabii."
languages.original_text: "Who? Oh, the xenos! He's holed up in there." {n}He nods at the barricaded gate.{/n} "He corralled a number of crewmen in there like {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groxes{/g} to a slaughterhouse, all we could hear were screams... Well, we couldn't save them, so we locked him in there so he couldn't crawl back out. Unless he finds a crack to squeeze through..."

traits.locale_text: "Kim? Ha, zeno! Şurada kapalı hâlde." {n}Kapalı kapıyı işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bir sürü tayfayı mezbahaya giden {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g}lar gibi orada topladı ve sonrasında çığlıklarından başka bir şey duymadık. Onları kurtaramadık, bari dışarı çıkmasın diye onu oraya kilitleyelim dedik. Bir delik bulup dışarı sızarsa bilemiyorum tabii."
traits.speaker: OfficerGuardHollow
